    • extractClaim

      public <T> T extractClaim(String token, Function<io.jsonwebtoken.Claims,T> claimsFunction)
      Description copied from interface: JwtAuthService
      Extracts a specific claim from the given token using the provided claims function.
      Specified by:
      extractClaim in interface JwtAuthService
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the desired value.
      Parameters:
      token - The token from which to extract the claim.
      claimsFunction - The function that takes the extracted claims and returns the desired value.
      Returns:
      The value obtained by applying the claims function to the extracted claims.
